tool_description: Turn form submissions into emails, no configuration required. Just build a form & submit POST data to our server, and the data arrives in your mailbox seconds later. Even attachments!
name: Formdata or Postdata to Email
title: Formdata or Postdata to Email

api_list.name: /{email-alias}
api_list.description: Sends an email to an email address associated with a specific email alias (username)

api_list.name: /{email-address}
api_list.description: Allows your users to post data to any email address or Alias & you'll receive an email response

api_list.name: /{username}
api_list.description: Sends an email to an email address associated with a specific username
